availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Wilson L. Pollard (Caldwell co. kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Virginia Pollard. Father of Frances Pollard, Margaret A. Pollard, Sarah L. Pollard, Virginia W. Pollard, and Robert S. Pollard. Married to Frances Gray Pollard in Trigg County, Kentucky, on September 30, 1844. Alvesta O. Pollard, Arista Ann Pollard, Wilson L. Pollard, Napoleon Pollard, Burris Pollard, Judson Pollard, Nannie Pollard, and Henry Pollard. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Owned fourteen enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Employed J. Killebrew as a farm laborer in Caldwell County in 1860. Owned thirteen enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 358A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 785.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Pollards Tan Yard, p. 150.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Pollards Tan Yard, p. 217A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trigg County Marriages, Film #000321335, p. 101.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994029, Caldwell County Deaths.
"Wilson L. Pollard (1803-1889)," Find A Grave, Memorial #18386267, accessed July 14, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/18386267.
